Peak effort at 93% FTP pushes into VO2max territory

nextSession.rationale: Progress from short intervals to sustained threshold efforts for marathon specificity

weeklyFocus: Tuesday: Easy 12-14km @ 4:50-5:00/km OR double with 6km @ 4:05/km in PM

recommendations.progressionNotes: Extend threshold intervals. You've proven you can execute 800m reps - time to progress to longer efforts that build sustained lactate clearance.

verdict.summary: Strong threshold session with good progressive execution. Power output and physiological response indicate solid fitness at lactate threshold.

goalViability.notes: Requires perfect execution of plan for 15 weeks. Current threshold pace is strong, but need more volume at marathon pace.
